title: TOP EPISODE OF ALL-TIME!! Not Only Would My Husband Bring Me Lemonade …
description:
Happy Labor Day Weekend!! Not only is this our favorite episode, it's your favorite episode too!! Listen to the MOST LISTENED to Call of the Day Episode of all-time!!

Lydia shares what else her husband would bring her if swimming through “shark-infested waters” … - Dr. Laura: "Your husband is all that and more!!"

Would you swim through "shark-infested waters?" Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
